app_desc: A transformative CTO and Senior Web Developer at LaunchingMax, bringing software visions to life. Proven leadership as the founder of Abzar Kankor, advancing high-quality education in Afghanistan. Committed to a culture of continuous learning, excelling in Java, Android, and full-stack web development. Passionate about delivering software solutions that enhance user experience for thousands worldwide. Prioritizing quality, performance, and security in the digital realm. Discover my journey at https://ibrahimi.info.
